import { memo, useState, useContext } from 'react' import './ProfileLayout.scss' import EditProfileIcon from '../../images/editUser.png' import HistoryBookingIcon from '../../images/bookingHistory.png' import { english, vietnamese } from '../../Languages/ProfileLayout' import EditProfile from '../../pages/EditProfile' function ProfileLayout({ languageSelected, children }) { const menu = languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese const [customer, setCustomer] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', birthDate: '', gender: '', address: '', city: '', phone: '', email: '' }) const [option, setOption] = useState(0) return (
{option === 0 ? :
}
) } export default memo(ProfileLayout)
